attributes.action: stun gun posession to be allowed for responsible adults for protection in their own homes against intruders.
attributes.additional_details: Posession of a stun gun to be made available to responsible adults,for their own protection in their own homes against intruders,Strict criteria to be in place including no prior criminal convictions,and no prior mental health problems.Severe penalties for anyone found outside of their domestic home with a stun gun.
